title: [Atoll, Ivory Path]
description: Ivory blocks twist back and forth along the atoll, the sand below rough with assorted driftwood, shells, and rocks.  Small hills of sand topped with vibrant green nut grass bespeckle the landscape, a splash of contrast to the dark sands and water.
Ivory blocks twist back and forth along the atoll, the sand below rough with assorted driftwood, shells, and rocks.  Small hills of sand are crested with vibrant green grass.
